title: QueryManipulatorSpecifications
description:
This message shall cause the receiving service to reply to the requestor with a ID 4600h:
      ReportManipulatorSpecifications message. A logical AND shall be performed on the requested presence vector and
      that representing the available fields from the responder. The resulting message shall contain the
      fields indicated by the result of this logical AND operation.

MessageID.comment: A two byte field to hold the message ID of a message
